Articles.Content:
![srD4Lts.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/srD4Lts.jpg)

**We Set Forth on the construction of The Ship**

This is half way through the build, i realized i wasn't taking screenshotsOh and that's Hansel! he will be our pilot and captain ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

![iVM0SUT.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/iVM0SUT.jpg)

**its getting there boys**

![GzuM9wV.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/GzuM9wV.jpg)

this guy is 100 tons, designed to send a rover to bop and get a station around jool

![8MsuwUR.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/8MsuwUR.jpg)

burning at the speed of a thousand ants we set on our journey. Buckle up Hansel and crew its gonna be a long trip!

![o5eLjq6.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/o5eLjq6.jpg)

**Bye Kerbin!**

![Gg236Qr.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Gg236Qr.jpg)

**Now just fixing up our transfer**

![9VThe74.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/9VThe74.jpg)

**Close enough!**

![YWhrgH4.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/YWhrgH4.jpg)

Hansel's view of jool.

![oO21Klo.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/oO21Klo.jpg)

**HANSEL! HES SO HOT RIGHT NOW, HANSEL!**

looks like shes gonna hold

![c4jOtT5.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/c4jOtT5.jpg)

**Just bringing down my apoapsis**

![nVDTDXe.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/nVDTDXe.jpg)

half way through the orbit shrinking i released my rover, on its way to Bop

![1VVkF7P.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/1VVkF7P.jpg)

**Done now dump these engines!**

![6KktvHm.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/6KktvHm.jpg)

**Meanwhile the rover gets slingshot by Tylo!**

This Big Sonavabitch pushed me in exactly the right direction! Thank you Tylo fatness!

![5Vkil8Y.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/5Vkil8Y.jpg)

**Bop Aproach!**

![xW6ytT1.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/xW6ytT1.jpg)

**RELEASE THE ROVER!**

rover and sky crane! 

![6Bvwtkp.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/6Bvwtkp.jpg)

**Come on little rover!**

Hansel cant help you now rover! Its all up to you!

![Uff2kTd.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Uff2kTd.jpg)

**Touchdown!**

the light gravity meant my sky crane didn't go boom... What a disappointment 

![M8YRq0T.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/M8YRq0T.jpg)

**Off to explore this rock!**

![OFqRbBI.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/OFqRbBI.jpg)

**Glamour shot With Laythe Vall and Tylo**
Impressive. I could never do this... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Impressive. I could never do this... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

YES YOU CAN! NEVER GIVE UP! Its just a bit of planning and you're there

Oh Bop, thou art the Kraken's home.

My first (and only) Bop mission was a manned lander.. Everything exploded other than the capsule. As far as I know, whats-his-name Kerman is still stranded on Bop.

Nice, you have gone where I exploded ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Nice!

One thing, though - why would you discard the engines? This ship has all the potential on becoming fully reusable, you know...
i wanted it to be a station and i didnt want to send it back to kerbin, ittle be used to refuel my later missions if they need refueling

Nice mission!

This belongs over in Mission Reports, moving.
sorry im pretty new to the forumn

> 
> sorry im pretty new to the forumn

Then, allow me to welcome you to the forums! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
This is very very good. Welcome.
Awesome job, exploring the Kraken's domain.
